alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond) (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 7:02PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL CHESTERFIELD... NORTHERN HENRICO AND SOUTHEASTERN HANOVER COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF RICHMOND THROUGH 745 PM EDT... At 702 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over University Of Richmond, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Richmond, Virginia Union University, Downtown Richmond, Tuckahoe, Virginia Commonwealth University, Laurel, and Lakeside around 705 PM EDT. East Highland Park and Glen Allen around 710 PM EDT. Mechanicsville around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Fair Oaks, Solomons Store, Chamberlayne, Atlee, Ashcake, Greendale, Hanover Airport, Roslyn Hills, Dumbarton, and Elmont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern Henrico; Western Chesterfield; Western Hanover; Western Henrico (Including the City of Richmond)
